description: Given an integer array nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
constraints: 2 <= nums.length <= 10^4; -10^9 <= nums[i] <= 10^9; exactly one valid answer exists.

problemName: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
description: You are given an array where prices[i] is the price of a stock on day i. Return the maximum profit from one buy and one sell.
Given an integer array nums, return true if any value appears at least twice.
Given two strings s and t, return true if t is an anagram of s.
constraints: 1 <= s.length, t.length <= 5 * 10^4; s and t consist of lowercase English letters.

description: Given a string containing just characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']', determine if the input string is valid.
constraints: 1 <= s.length <= 10^4; s consists of parentheses only.

description: You are climbing a staircase. It takes n steps to reach the top. Each time you can climb 1 or 2 steps. Return number of distinct ways.
Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.
constraints: 0 <= s.length <= 5 * 10^4; s consists of English letters, digits, symbols and spaces.

description: Given an integer array nums, return all unique triplets [nums[i], nums[j], nums[k]] such that their sum is zero.
Given n non-negative integers where each represents a point at coordinate (i, height[i]), find two lines that together form a container with maximum water.
Given an integer array nums, return an array answer where answer[i] equals product of all elements of nums except nums[i].
constraints: 2 <= nums.length <= 10^5; -30 <= nums[i] <= 30; solution should run in O(n) without division.

description: Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray with the largest sum and return its sum.
Given an array of strings strs, group the anagrams together.
Given an array of intervals, merge all overlapping intervals and return an array of non-overlapping intervals.
Given coins of different denominations and an integer amount, return the fewest number of coins needed to make up that amount.
Given a 2D binary grid map of '1's and '0's, return the number of islands.
constraints: m == grid.length; n == grid[i].length; 1 <= m, n <= 300.

description: There is an integer array nums sorted in ascending order (with distinct values), possibly rotated. Return index of target if found, else -1.

problemName: Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array
description: Suppose an array sorted in ascending order is rotated between 1 and n times. Return the minimum element.
constraints: n == nums.length; 1 <= n <= 5000; -5000 <= nums[i] <= 5000; all integers of nums are unique.

description: Given an integer array nums, find a contiguous non-empty subarray with the largest product.
Given n non-negative integers representing an elevation map, compute how much water it can trap after raining.
Given two sorted arrays nums1 and nums2, return the median of the two sorted arrays in O(log(m+n)) time.
constraints: nums1.length == m; nums2.length == n; 0 <= m, n <= 1000; 1 <= m + n <= 2000.

description: A transformation sequence from beginWord to endWord must change only one letter at a time and each transformed word must exist in wordList. Return shortest transformation length.
